price: 64. Diggah is jaciim deqsitta girák ragidik tawqe caxa.
arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innahā shajaratun takhruju fī aṣli al-jaḥīmi
